This halfling bow requires a full draw for smaller folk, but serves as a quick off-hand for those of greater height.

Shortbow 18m Two-Handed

Bow of Awareness is one of the Shortbow Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Bow of Awareness is a magical bow that gives +1 on initiative rolls.
